elements.text: When you equip or adjust your armor, choose one.

options.name: Lightly armored
options.text: When you *Endure Harm* in a fight, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

options.name: Heavily armored
options.text: Mark encumbered. When you *Endure Harm* in a fight, add +2 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

elements.text: When you *Clash* while you are geared for war, add +1.
When you *Compel* in a situation where strength of arms is a factor, add +2.
